choices: You wake up alone in your room
You wake up clutching an amulet
You wake up hooked up to a giant machine
You wake up in class
Other
1.content:
"What is this?" and "where am I?" Are the first questions that pop into your groggy head as you lean around and check out your new surroundings. It's a bright cloudy day, but something seems very off to you.

You're on some sort of farm land, and the trees don't look quite right to you. There is something unnatural about them. You're pretty sure a branch on one of them is made out of candy cane.

As you walk towards the fence in the distance, you feel a weight press down against your shoulders and push you to the ground. You knees and hands are now stuck in a pile of mud. At least you hope it's mud.

As you push your hands up, you find that your fingers have somehow webbed together in each hand. Another push hardens them, and you try desperately to push yourself back. But no matter how hard you push, the unnatural gravity pushes you down.

You land in the mud again, and expect all your fingers to be broken, but as you look down, see that you no longer have hands, but some sort of hooves. You scream for help, but only a giant 'neigh' is heard.

Terrified, you feel you neck spurt out more, and are pretty sure that you crapped during the process. Another scream of terror lets out a giant 'neigh' and you see a farmer and a little girl hop the fence to come to your aid.

"Is she alright dad?" the little girl asks.
Her dad strokes the back of your neck, and you calm down a bit.
"This horse is a 'he'." he corrects her.
"What's wrong?" she asks.
He dad gives you a quick examination.
"Nothing looks wrong, he just seems a little spooked. Maybe he say a bear in the woods, or a giant fox." the dad says, adding the second example not to scare the child.

The farmer goes right up to your face, and you realize it looks like your neighbor. Not exactly like him, he hands seem freakishly big, and he seems more muscular and handsome than he does in real life.

You look down at the girl, it's his six year old daughter. Nessie, or Vanessa, or something with an 'S' in her name.
"Can I feed him an apple?" she asks gleefully.
"Sure." he father says, taking an apple out of his pocket, and sticking it in front of your teeth for a bite.

You're about to crunch down, when suddenly you wake up.
"Ah, I was about to get an apple." you think.
1.title: You Find Yourself On A Farm

choices: You quickly fall asleep and return to that same strange dream.
You quickly fall asleep and have another strange dream.
You fall asleep and wake up later.
You notice something strange, either with you or your room.
You can't sleep, so you go get breakfast.
11.content: You wake up in your bed, confused at your dream. "I've had some strange dreams... but that one takes the cake." You say, looking at your clock, seeing that it is only 5 in the morning. "I'll try to sleep for a couple hours..." you say to yourself as you roll over.
11.title: You wake up alone in your room

choices: You are in a salon, getting a makeover.
You are in a forest, with a unicorn trotting over to you.
Your bed is made of aluminum, and is shaped like a capsule.
112.content: You lay in bed, curling up in your blanket with a long yawn. You drift into a dream, though it feels like the one you just woke up from instead of a normal one, and you actually feel yourself going into this dream, as if you were going to another world. You feel like you are waking up, and open your eyes. What you see surprises you.
112.title: You quickly fall asleep and have another strang...

choices: You wake in your room.
You wake up in another dream.
She does your hair.
1121.content:
Your eyes open, and you are sitting in a chair. You are dressed in a black shirt and shorts, and are oddly barefoot. You see a young girl in her 20s, getting ready. You are confused, looking around. "What am I doing here...?" you say to yourself. The woman gives you a strange look, "Glenn, are you feeling alright?" She asks, concerned. You nod and smile. "I'm fine." You say, and she nods. "Good." She says, smiling sweetly as she gets out some pink nail polish and wipes it on the rim of the bottle. You give her a strange look, "Umm... what are you doing?" you ask her. She nonchalantly starts painting your toenails bright pink, "Giving you the pedicure you asked for?" she asks, confused as she continues them.

She does your hands, and you can't move or tell her you don't want her to. She just smiles at you, continuing your makeover with pink glittery lipstick. You pucker up instantly, unable to control yourself. You try to tell her no, and to stop, but your mouth just waits for the lipstick. She puts it on rather heavy. "Smack your lips together, Glenn." She says with a smile. You obey, smacking your lips and tasting it. You gag, and you feel the dryer on your head turn off. You blink and the girl smiles at you again. "We'll do the rest after your hair." She says, and you smile. "Thanks miss." You say, your voice sounding high.
1121.title: You are in a salon, getting a makeover.

choices: The dream affected you.
You tell her you had the same dream.
11211.content:
You wake up, shaking as you abruptly awaken from the dream. The sudden absence of what was put on you is striking, but you are relieved as you feel yourself as you were before the dream. "It was just a dream..." you say to yourself, just to assure yourself so. You turn on the light and make sure, everything is normal including yourself. You look at the clock and head downstairs. You make breakfast and think about why you'd be dreaming that.

Your little sister Tanya comes down, smiling at you cooking. "Cook some for me too, bro." She says, and you nod as you throw some more on. "I had the weirdest dream..." she says, and you look at her curiously. "Oh really? Tell me about it..." She looks at you funny. "Well... I was a salonist and I was giving you a makeover... and you didn't even try to say no or anything." You blink and try to hide what you know. "Yeah... crazy dream huh?" Tanya nods, "I'll say. It was fun though." she giggles softly.
11211.title: You wake in your room.

choices: Later, as you're going to bed
Continue
112112.content:
"I had the exact same dream!" you say

"You were giving yourself a makeover?" she asks?

"no, i was being given a makeover, but i woke up after that part."

"really? thats crazy, why were you dreaming about getting a girly makeover, and its good you woke up after that, My dream continued."

"What happened?" you ask

"After I did your , I did your nails, hot pink and glittery, and they I played around with your hair, somehow it was long, you asked me to dye it blond, and I did, after it was done, i gave you a short pink skirt and pink tank top, and you wore them. you looked great, you had beautiful shaved legs and perfect hair.

You thanked me, paid and left the Salon but I could see you out the window making out with some guy, and you were really into it"

"Thats a weird dream" you say

"yeah even weirder that you dreamed some of the same stuff, you got a secret?." she laughed

"no way! but yeah that is weird."
112112.title: You tell her you had the same dream.

choices: You're dreaming the rest of what your sister told you about.
You are dreaming about stuff after what she said.
1121121.content: After a very typical day, you go back to bed and lie down after thinking some more about that dream. You lie down and have a little bit of trouble sleeping, but soon drift away. You feel a strange feeling, like you can feel the dream coming on as you fall asleep. You open your eyes and look around, feeling your hair is done in the curls your sister mentioned.
1121121.title: Later, as you're going to bed

choices: Another dream
You wake up
11211211.content:
Things continue like this, you can't stop the stylist, in fact you're actively making suggestions.

As your newly long blond hair is set in curlers she starts on your nails, you can''t help but relax and let her do her work

When she's finished your marvel at your gorgeous nails, you then say, "do you have any clothes i could wear? I want to look sexy for my man"

Horrified at what you've said but knowing your reliving the dream your sister told you about so you know where this is going.

"I sure do, let me get you something."

She quickly returns with a hot pink mini skirt and tank top.

you squeel with delight clearly loving the outfit, you grab the outfit and change nearly instantly.

You look down at yourself, your not sure how or when they appeared but you have massive breasts pressing up against the tank top, stretching it nearly to bursting. Your legs are clean shaven and look gorgeous coming out of your skirt, your feet are adorned with matching pink spike heels, that you cant imagine walking in. though you seem to have no problem with them

You look in the mirror and squeel with delight you grab some money out of glittery pink purse sitting beside you suddenly hand the woman some money and nearly skip out of the Salon.

As soon as you do, you see a man, you stop dead in your tracks. Then squeel again and leap at him quickly pressing your lipstick covered lips against his and then your tongues start to intermingle.

If you could, you'd be gagging.

After nearly 5 minutes of this, things start to fade to white
11211211.title: You're dreaming the rest of what your siste...

choices: You are in a field, transformed into a humanoid rabbit.
Something else.
112112111.content: You feel as if you are thrust while your vision is white, your body losing feeling and being carried away. Your vision goes dark, and you look around. Shrouded in darkness, you walk around and try to find the light. You find a switch, but it doesn't turn on. You feel cold, and continue. Soon you see a faint light and head toward it, and start to hear something. You see the light is coming from behind a door, and is a rainbow color. Opening the door, slowly, the light engulfs you. It blinds you, and all you see is a swirl of the colors of the rainbow. You feel yourself fall forward, and you cannot get up. After you stop trying, your body gets up on it's own. Disoriented, you look around at at yourself.
112112111.title: Another dream

choices: You put the clothes on.
You refuse.
1121121111.content: You look at yourself, you've been turned into a rabbit! You are about 4 feet tall, with huge soft paws that tickle when you touch them. Creamy fur covers you, and your nose smells flowers and carrots. After you look over this body, you look around. You are in a dressing room, with a sexy blood red and black corset on the chair. There are fishnet gloves and stockings laid out, and a little black dress waiting to be put on.
1121121111.title: You are in a field, transformed into...

choices: After the dance.
You wake.
11211211111.content:
Whoever is dreaming this, this outfit belongs to you. You slide it on, tingling at your soft skin and fur. "Ohh, what's going on?" You say to yourself, sliding the stockings on then th gloves. You squeeze into the corset, and finally the dress. You grab a carrot and start to eat it, wondering what is going on here. Then you notice another rabbit watching you, dressed in blue and sniffing the flowers. "Oh, Hi there." you say, and she gives you a strange look. "Um... this is new. What's your name?" she asks with a smile as she takes your carrot from your mouth. "Glenn." you say, then she looks curious. "Uh, you are a boy?" You blush in realization. "Well... yeah I am." She stares at you, "This is too weird, oh... you sound just like..." she looks shocked. "You were in my art class last semester!" She exclaims, and you recognize her voice. "Uh... oh hey um... Steffi!" She stares at you, "Are you... are you in my dream?" You nod, "It sure feels like someone else's... but I am dreaming..."

Steffi thinks, "Prove it... tomorrow morning, tell me about this dream. I'll kiss your hand if you start off correct." You nod, "Okay, so what is this dream about, Steffi?" You ask curiously. She looks down, "Well, um... I'm here to practice dancing. Why don't we both?" You look nervous, but she pulls you into a complicated routine, which you follow quite easily for some reason.
11211211111.title: You put the clothes on.

choices: Your sister is curious of the dream.
Nothing strange occurs at breakfast.
112112112.content: You wake up kissing your pillow like the boy in your dream, then with your control back you jolt away from the bed. After a few minutes, you regain your composure and lay down to relax. You get up out of bed and head to the kitchen for breakfast.
112112112.title: You wake up

choices: Try on feminine clothing.
Refuse again.
1121121121.content:
On the way to breakfast, your sister stops you and giggles. "Did you have that dream again?" she asks, and you blush softly. "Yeah, I... I had my hair all curly and had beautiful pink nails..." You say, then look away as you don't feel embarrassed by it as much as you should. Your sister smiles, "It looked like you enjoyed it... especially that silly outfit I picked for you." You nod and blush, "It felt weird... like I couldn't control myself." you try to explain. She nods, "Why don't you try it for real, maybe you secretly like it?" You shake your head, "No way, I know I don't like it!" you insist, but your sister smiles sweetly. "Come on, just try some of my things on and tell me if it feels different from our dream."

You sigh and look her in the eyes, "I'm telling you, I don't like girly stuff!" She shakes her head, "Come on, aren't you even a little bit curious?" You look at her outfit, blue shorts and a tanktop, as you give your final answer to this question.
1121121121.title: Your sister is curious of the dream.

choices: You are dressed in a very nice suit, apparently her date.
You are a girl, dressed in a beautiful gown, with some expensive jewelry.
11212.content: You suddenly feel like you are waking up, but also like you are falling asleep. You can't explain it, but the smells of the salon are gone as is the feel of nail polish and lipstick. You are more aware of what's going on, and you have a gut feeling as you feel a new dream coming. You smell food, good food at that. You look around, and see a girl made over like you had just dreamed. You blink a few times at the similarity, wondering if there's something connecting your dreams. You look at her, and the rest of your surroundings. You feel a bit uncomfortable, and look at yourself.
11212.title: You wake up in another dream.

choices: Play along and be his girlfriend to the dance
Scream and try to find a way out of this creepy dream
112122.content:
You approach the mirror in disbelief and touch your face only to see the girl in the mirror mimic your actions. Looking at your reflection it's easy to tell your body is that of a female too now. You look in the corner of your eye and see a handsome boy in a nice suit in the doorway with flowers in his hand. He walks up behind you wrapping his arms around your waist and kissing your cheek.

He tells you "Babe, you look great" and hands you the flowers. You take the flowers and can't help but think you two make a really good couple, even though you're the girlfriend. Still concerned you don't know quite how to react to this shock.
112122.title: You are a girl, dressed in a beautiful gown, wi...

choices: You are in a beautiful dress, and have long brunette pigtails.
You've become a unicorn like her.
A pair of fairy wings is on your back, and you are holding a wand.
1122.content: You blink, looking at the unicorn. She comes closer to you, and you make her out more clearly. She is a bright white, with a pink horn and hearts on both sides. She has a pretty pink saddle and bridle, and looks very graceful as she trots closer and closer. She whinnies happily as she trots around you. You nervously reach out to her, and she rubs her head against your hand. You feel her horn gently, in awe at how real she seems. She rubs against you hard, and you put your hand back on her face, to stroke it more vigorously. She rubs against you and starts to lick, you giggle at her tickling tongue. Her horn glows slowly as you rub her, and you swear you can see her start to smile. Her horn glows, and glows more, now a vibrant pink aura around it. You touch her horn, and are surrounded by the same aura very slowly. You feel a sensation around you as her magic takes effect, giving you a blissful feeling. You feel different and you look in her eyes, which are very beautiful and as blue as the sky. The glow soon fades, and you realize that the aura did something.
1122.title: You are in a forest, with a unicorn trotting ov...

choices: You hear a girl singing.
You hear the unicorn talking.
11222.content:
You have a familiar feeling as your hands web and become hooves, even worse your hooves look like they have pink polish on them. You feel your hair grow into a beautiful mane, a lighter pink than your new hooves. You shake and open your eyes a few times, feeling unicorn hair all over you. You feel your bones move around to match a unicorn, your butt feeling a jab as a tail shoots out of it. You whinny and snort, while the other unicorn just smiles. You feel a jab in your forehead as a horn grows, pink like your hooves. Your face contorts and stretches for the nose of a unicorn, and soon the rest of your body matches hers. You feel something on your eyelashes, and you notice she has makeup on her eyes.


The aura fades, and you start to graze before stopping yourself. You look at the unicorn, curious as to what this dream is about... or is this real? You think it over, starting to graze again and this time going through with it. She joins you in grazing, clopping her hooves and whinnying. You soon start to copy her, and she smiles. You hear a voice, but can't make it out... then you hear it again.
11222.title: You've become a unicorn like her.

choices: You eat something.
The hungry feeling wakes you up.
112222.content:
You nibble at the grass, until you hear the unicorn start to talk to you. "Every little girl wishes to just see one of us, it is very noble of you to live under her." You blink confused and ask "What do you mean? What exactly is going on?" She just smiles, as you suddenly feel a soft hand on your butt. "Come along, Sir Princess." a little girl says to you, the name not sounding odd to you. It appears she treats you like a mare, though she knows you are a man still. Once you turn around, you feel a bridle appear on your muzzle and a lead in her hand. The girl is close to pale, in a pink dress with a design of a unicorn fighting a cutesy-looking dragon.

With a short tug you begin walking with her, noticing world around you seems off. The trees all look the same, the flowers are all perfect, the animals have flat-colored fur, and there are a lot of them. You don't feel tired, or even awkward, walking in hooves. As you follow her, she mutters things that must be her real thoughts. Questions about her friends, and she mentions you briefly before she stops in front of the garden. You find out, in real life, she's the sister of a close friend of yours.

Looking around, you see a carrot patch, an apple tree, a sugarcane plant, and a tree made of hay. You blink at this, feeling a sudden urge to eat. The girl smiles, petting your mane and making you twitch at the feeling. "Go on, you must be starving." Just as she says that, your stomach grumbles loudly and you feel like you haven't eaten in days.
112222.title: You hear the unicorn talking.

choices: A familiar woman waits inside for the two of you, clad in a cow-print dress.
The entrance is white, bringing you out of the dream when you enter the castle.
1122221.content:
With a shrug of your broad shoulders, you move your muzzle and take a small bite of the sugar cane. Though you haven't eaten the plant, the taste surprises you. The texture is much like wet grass, and the taste reminds you more of honey than pure sugar. You can't seem to help wagging your tail, and after eating and taking a second bite you feel a pat on your neck. "Thata girl." she tells you as she rubs your neck and shoulders. Your tail wags like a dog's, twitching when she stops however.

Despite the taste not being the best, you keep wanting to eat until you are almost stuffed. Strangely, you can't stop yourself from eating the sugar cane until you really are stuffed, your lips covered with sugar. After another firm pat on your chest, you feel the girl climb onto your back. The lead completely disappears when she grabs the reigns, and you follow how she moves them. You try to resist following the reigns, but the bridle squeezes your face briefly to break your focus.

A kick to each of your sides puts you into a gallop, where things get even stranger than they have been. You run in a straight line, until you think about turning and do so without being guided. Gradually, you gallop in circles and see that she moves the reigns how you are choosing to turn. You slow down to test this theory, and she immediately tugs them, making you close your eyes a moment.

The child yells "Whoa girl!" and brings you to a complete stop as you open your eyes; they go wide at the sight of a huge castle. You are certain there wasn't one before you stopped. It is medieval, with two large towers on each side and surrounded by a moat but without any animals in view. The drawbridge lowers, hitting the ground in front of you with a thud. The girl kicks your sides again, "Hi-yah!". You trot into the castle, your hooves pounding the wood.
1122221.title: You eat something.

choices: Your sister notices you.
She doesn't notice.
11222212.content:
You notice nothing but white as you are led to the castle, and when you step into the white light you feel your body return to normal all at once, awake in your bed. For some reason, being a unicorn felt deeper than a dream. You grab your head, feeling hungry as the dream involved eating, and get out of bed on your hands and knees. Feeling strange, you stand up and try to shrug off the odd dream and head to the kitchen for breakfast. Your sister has cooked you some waffles, which you devour before she returns downstairs to watch TV.

The dream doesn't seem as odd when you notice your sister watching a show about horses, she always liked them and you must have been annoyed so much you dreamed about them. Now that you think of it, the girl might be a character from another show your sister watches. Feeling at ease, you quietly go into her room to see if you recognize things from your dream there, you can think of several excuses to just look in her room, even the truth would keep her from being mad... maybe it's more than a dream and she could help?
11222212.title: The entrance is white, bringing you out of the ...

choices: You are hypnotized through this dream.
You wake up under the effects of hypnosis.
You wake up unaffected, it's a dream after all.
1123.content:
You awake in a capsule shaped bed, made of aluminum you would guess. It feels very soft and comfortable, like a cocoon. You feel awake, but the bed strikes you as not being quite normal. You lay there, wondering what to do. Then, you hear a voice. The voice sounds like hypnosis, commanding you First it makes you unable to move, then implants suggestions. You aren't sure if the suggestions will affect you or not, but it soon becomes clear they work at least for this dream.

Although you are hypnotized, it seems that whatever is going on also makes you forget what the hypnosis is actually doing to you. You soon feel your strength return, and can stand up. You hold your head, the messages beginning to mess with your head. You look around and the room matches the metal of the bed you just got out of, and you can hear voices from the next room. It seems like you are in your house with your room changed, as you hear your family nearby. You wonder what to do now, but soon your mind decides for you.
1123.title: Your bed is made of aluminum, and is shaped lik...

choices: Continue.
You wake up.
11231.content:
You listen to the voice, telling you things. You come to believe them, but only as you believe this dream is real.

Your name is Brenna.
Brenna serves as a maid.
Brenna cannot stand filth.
Brenna loves her uniform.
Brenna wants to clean.
Cleaning is your goal.

You have an urge to clean, and you quickly give in to it. You wander the bland house full of dust and filth, cleaning and scrubbing. For a dream, it really wears you out.
11231.title: You are hypnotized through this dream.

info.brief_description: You are a 15 year old named Glenn boy who can hop in other people's dreams.
info.description:
This is a story about a boy named Glenn who has the ability to jump into other people's dreams. Why and how he does this is up to you. Ideally if he jumps into a dream, he transforms to fit into it. (ex: If he jumps into a nightmare about monsters, he either becomes a monster, or a character in the dream,) but if you have a great idea, go with that.

-Don't do pointless filler for choices, give at least 1000 characters (letters) per chapter.
It works better if you give the reader a clear choice.

-Links to pictures are okay, but try and describe the person/place/thing yourself. If keeps the atmosphere going.

-Its in a dream, don't be scared to be strange!

-Don't limit yourself to the persons dreams, feel free to describe the boy's life outside of it.

And as always, try and use proper spelling and grammar, and have fun!
